item.title: Scala Self Recursive Types
item.description: One of the advantages of using a statically typed language is that you can use the type system to enforce some constraints. Scala provides self-recursive types, aka F-bounded polymorphic types that–along with self types–let you put powerful constraint to your type definitions.
